title: Mustang Mach-E: the hype is real
description: Fords electric Mustang Mach-E is a huge bet on the future, and after spending a week with the EV, The Verges Sean OKane thinks that bet will pay off. Its fun to drive, solidly built, and puts technology front and center without messing it up. Its the best electric car on the road not made by Tesla or Porsche, which is a huge deal considering the project was only spun up a few short years ago.
